We need a policy in place that makes it absolutely necessary for any School or College to show that they are tackling the issues of bullying, and in particular homophobia and the use of homophobic language.

Educational establishments are without a doubt the places that these problems begin and perpetuate.

Regardless of establishment autonomy, it is our responsibility to make sure that the young people of this country learn about these issues in a productive and effective way.
